short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides 2022 Winter Olympic spoilers from video titles on https://www.nbcolympics.com/

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The NBC Olympics website spoils the results of the events in the replay video titles. This extension hides the title fields on the website to keep it spoiler free.
